body: To all innocent souls that have stumbled into this comment section, If you are reading this, you are immune to all current or future curses on this site. Copy and paste this to 5 other manga, so others may be saved as well. I'm doing this to help y'all out. Stay safe everyone.
Zest is best girl. All others are literally garbage.
Ideally want a threesome doujinshi with Basara, Zest and Sensei- man, that would be so hot!
Yes, a Zest Doujin finally got translated. Today is a good day.
Yay! <3 I had a hunch there would be a response of this nature after what went down the other day... Life without Zest is like an orange without its color, or pesto sauce without basil and garlic.
